about_the_game:
This Special "Found Footage Mode" adds the option to experience the Story of Greyhill through a very classic 90s Black and white Body Cam.

THE FOUND FOOTAGE MODE
The Found Footage Mode is the ultimate upgrade for Greyhill Incident.

THE NIGHTMARE OF EVERY ALIEN BELIEVER
Experience the Story of Greyhill through a very classic 90s Black and white Body Cam.

SWITCH WHENEVER YOU WANT
You can switch the mode during the game whenever you want through the pause menu.

EXPERIENCE GREYHILL IN A DIFFERENT WAY
The Found Footage Mode gives the game the ultimate 90s vibe and highers the rural atmosphere even more!


You may also check out the "Fan Pack" DLC or the "Digital Abducted Edition" Bundle to get both DLCs discounted together.
